choices: Jack uses the button on himself.
Hannah comes home and Jack uses the button on her.
Hannah comes home and they both use the button together.
Hannah comes home, bringing a mutual friend.
Jack does something with the button besides using it on a person.
1.content:
Jack sat at his computer, currently lost inside a world of chatrooms and forums, as he had a tendency to. The Internet was a fairly big part of his life, and heck, it was a big part of the reason why he was where he was now.

Jack idly glanced over at the picture he kept on his desk - one of him and a black haired girl standing on a beach, smiling like nothing else in the world mattered. The black-haired, green-eyed girl in the photo with him was Hannah, his first as well as current girlfriend. Their meeting was a curious one, and it was actually due to a unique, strange interest they both shared - muscle growth. The two met on a forum dedicated to the topic of outlandish and fantastical muscle growth, and spent countless nights over the course of months conversing about it. Eventually, they managed to discover that not only were they the same age, but they actually lived in the same town. They met up at a cafe in real life and each found the other one nice, likable, and sharing in the same interests. They started the relationship soon afterwards. When college applications rolled around, they both decided to go for Northern State University, both due to its prestige and the two of them wanting to stay close to one another. When they were both accepted, they pooled their money together and bought an apartment a block away from the campus for privacy reasons.

And now, here they were. Hannah was out getting a few groceries at the moment, but they had the whole place to themselves. Though he wasn't exactly the most physical person, Jack had great grades, an amazing girlfriend, and a wonderful place to live. Everything was going alright.

However, it was about to get... a bit more interesting.

When Jack's eyes went from the picture back to his computer screen, he suddenly found a pop-up ad obscuring most of his view. It read:

"WANT TO CHANGE ANYTHING AND ANYONE YOU WANT? ACHIEVE IT WITH THE REALITY BUTTON!"

Jack simply rolled his eyes and went to close out the ad. These things always promised ridiculous things like losing 40 pounds without any exercise or whatever. He couldn't believe some people still fell for these.

He clicked the "X" to close out the pop-up.

... It didn't close.

After a second of confusion, Jack tried to close the window once more. Still nothing. He leaned back in his chair, letting out a breath of frustration.

"Dang, it's one of THESE things. Might just have to restart the computer to get rid of it. ... Or..."

He read the message over again. The power to change ANYTHING or ANYONE he wanted... that would definitely be a treat... He quickly shook the thought out of his head. There was no WAY that was possible. It broke every law of science he knew, and why would it just be given away by a pop-up ad?

...

Aw, what the heck. He had virus protection anyways.

He clicked on the ad.

It disappeared for a second... then another box popped. This one simply read "ENJOY."

Jack spent a couple of seconds deciding what THAT could mean, when suddenly... the doorbell rang.

His mind immediately jumping to the conclusion that Hannah had forgotten her key again, Jack got out of his chair and went over to the door. He swung it open, revealing...

Nothing.

After a second of confusion, Jack looked down. Sitting on the doormat was a small cardboard box. That was... weird. He didn't remember ordering anything. Jack peered out the doorway, looking left and right to see who could have dropped it off. No one was there. Curious.

Not thinking too much of it, Jack picked up the box and shut the door. He looked the box over as he walked back to his computer. Oddly, it had no return address. Or any address that it was sent to, for that matter. How did it reach his doorstep then?

When he got back to his computer, he sat down and looked back up at the screen. The pop-up was gone.

He put two and two together.

Jack's heart was racing as he did his best to tear open the packaging. The cardboard was tough, but he did his best, and after a minute or so a small object fell into his lap.

Jack dropped the remainders of the box onto the floor and picked it up. It appeared to be a small red button, similar to the Easy button from Staples. This had no writing on it, however, and was a bit smaller, fitting neatly into the palm of his hand. Jack ran his fingers over it. It felt cold and metallic... but still strangely inviting, somehow. It gave Jack the feeling the description of it was true.

Jack stood up and began to pace, never taking his eyes off of the button. He could... he could get anything he wanted now? He could CHANGE anything he wanted now? As much as he wanted to keep thinking it wasn't possible, there was no other explanation for what had happened. If he understood it right, all he had to do was think of what he wanted to happen, push the button, and it would happen. He could do ANYTHING! Jack found it a bit harder to breathe as his mind raced with ideas.

All he had to do was choose one.
1.title: Just An Ordinary Day

choices: It's Hannah, who is incredibly surprised at his growth.
It's Hannah... who doesn't seem to notice anything different.
It's a superhero... apparently he was thinking about Superman a bit too much...
It's someone else entirely.
Before he can answer the door, he finds out that the changes aren't done yet...
11.content:
Out of the corner of his eye, Jack noticed the Superman posted he had hanging up on his wall. It brought back memories of all the comics he had read up until this point. Superheroes lifting cars over their heads, stopping trains, punching through solid steel walls...

... And there was the idea. The one, most important thing to him right now.

He brought his eyes down to the button. He somehow knew that he only had to think what he wanted, but he said it anyways:

"I wish I was the biggest, strongest, most muscular being on the planet."

And with that, he pressed the button.

Instantly, it felt like there was an explosion ripping up from his hand over the rest of his body. Jack cried out, almost dropping the button from his hand instinctively. He felt so much pain... and yet, oddly enough, the pain was almost mixed with a little bit of pleasure. Like there was also a nice heat making its way across his form.

Jack felt his chest starting to strain a bit. At first, he thought it was because his heart was beating so fast. Well, his heart WAS doing that, but when he looked down, he could see that his chest was straining for a completely different reason - he was GROWING! Good, honest to god, straight up growing. It almost looked like he was taking breaths and his pectorals were just... staying there. And the cycle kept repeating itself. Right in front of his eyes, Jack was seeing his chest start to stretch out his Batman t-shirt, partially obscuring his view. Not letting that stop him, he reached down, smiling widely as he felt abdominals pop up on his stomach, forming a solid six-pack... which then split up and grew even further into an eight-pack!

Ignoring the increasing sound of stretching fabric, Jack reached down further and wrapped his hands around his swelling thighs. That task was becoming increasingly difficult as the muscles expanded in diameter - not only did they feel as big as grapefruits, they were getting insanely hard as well. Jack could tell that these muscles weren't just for show.

Jack almost felt like having a heart attack when he realized that the best part was still to come - the biceps. Not wanting to miss the show, he raised both his arms, almost letting out a yell of happiness as even that minor action caused them to gain a couple of inches all around. It felt like he was watching something out of a cartoon - his arm muscles went from the size of a baseball, to the size of large rock... all the way to what almost looked like soccer balls stuffed under his skin! Even better than the sight of it was just the immense feeling of adrenaline and power Jack felt, knowing how strong he probably was.

Almost as quickly as it started, Jack felt the growth fading, eventually dying out completely. He was just left to catch his breath, stand there, and dwell on everything that had just occurred.

Even breathing made him feel like a titan, watching his pecs nearly burst out with every single inhale. And that wasn't even getting to the rest of his body. Getting curious as to how it would feel in motion, Jack took a cautious step forward. It was... an odd sensation. He knew his body was heavier, and he felt it, but at the same time his legs were so strong it felt like he could leap a mile in a single bound. This was unreal.

Jack turned, looking at a full-length mirror on the other side of the room. Seeing his full body just made him feel ten times better. He was AMAZING! It almost looked like some kind of cartoon 0 Jack was unbelievably swollen, but in all the right places. Humongous pecs, abs that looked as hard as steel, legitimately INSANE biceps... it almost took Jack a second to realize his leg growth had made him even taller. He was probably around 6' 6" now, a tall height which just made his muscles look all the more intimidating. In fact, he was surprised his clothes had even survived the growth... though his Batman t-shirt was stretched so thin he could see his skin through it, and his shorts looked like they were painted on his body. Finally, Jack looked up at his own face, surprised to see that it had received minor changes as well. He now had a slightly more square jaw, and even a little bit of stubble on him. It was still obviously him, just a bit more... strong-looking.

Jack just stood there for a good while, admiring his own looks. This was all he had ever wanted! He didn't know how the button had actually worked, but he didn't care. He was huge, super strong, and quite good-looking, if he could say so himself. In fact, now he was thinking about -

Before he could finish that thought, there was a knock at the door.
11.title: Jack uses the button on himself.

choices: ... the gym."
... your interview."
... class."
112.content:
"I'm back!"

Jack froze instantly. He could feel his heart starting to race again. Hannah was back. His feelings of euphoria suddenly turned into panic and desperation. What was he going to do? She was going to see him and then freak out and that would be no good for anyone. And how would he explain it? A magic button appeared at the door that granted his wishes? Even his girlfriend wouldn't believe that.

Of course, the apartment wasn't that big, so there was nowhere for him to go. As Jack heard the doorknob twisting open, the only action he could manage was hiding the button behind his wide back before the door flung open.

He heard the sound of Hannah's shoes making their way across the wood floor. As she walked into the room Jack was in, he braced himself for the reaction.

"Hey."

... What?

"Oh. Um... hey."

Now Jack's mind was racing even faster. This somehow made even less sense. Even if she had reacted well for whatever reason, he had expected her to... react. She seemed to be ignoring the fact that he was now some sort of giant super-bodybuilder. Why was that?

"What did you do while I was gone?"

Hannah's question snapped Jack out of his thoughts. If she was acting natural, well, he would have to as well until he figured out what was going on.

"Oh... the usual stuff. Sitting around, mostly."

Hannah let out that little giggle of hers that he loved to hear. "Well, you can't spend TOO much time sitting around, or you'll lose all that awesome bulk of yours."

Okay, he was getting more clues now. It wasn't like he was imagining his new size; she obviously saw it too. And yet she was still acting like it was completely normal...

... Wait, was his chair bigger?

Making sure Hannah wasn't looking (she was busy pulling various items out of her purse), Jack leaned over to get a better look at it. Yeah... it was definitely bigger. Probably big enough to completely fit his new size. Upon closer inspection, it was a bit nicer than the old chair as well.

But leaning in made Jack notice something else even more astonishing. The same picture as before was sitting on his desk... but next to the same-looking Hannah was the new, hulk-ified version of him. That picture had been taken months ago! Jack realized he had a lot more to learn about the mysterious button...

Suddenly, Hannah spoke up. "Oh yeah, it's getting close to 4 o'clock. You should probably be heading off to...
112.title: It's Hannah... who doesn't seem to noti...

choices: "... an incredibly successful pro bodybuilder."
"... the sexiest man alive."
"... the richest man on the planet."
1122.content:
"Uh... my what?"

Hannah rolled her eyes, though a smile was still plastered on her face. Apparently Jack being a somewhat forgetful dork was something that hadn't changed with his size. "Don't tell me you forgot. You had an interview scheduled for that personal trainer position at the bodybuilding gym at 4:30, remember?"

"Oh, yeah, right!" Jack said this with renewed enthusiasm, though he didn't really have clear memories of scheduling an interview... or much at all that had changed, really. At the same time, though, he felt like the memory was there, just hidden behind a hazy fog in his mind... maybe there were more memories there, just waiting for him to discover? This was more complicated than he thought.

"Hey, why are you wearing those old clothes? I thought you outgrew those a couple weeks back..."

Jack looked down at his own mighty chest, being reminded of just how tight his current shirt was, the Batman symbol stretched out probably too far. "Uh... well, I just thought these clothes showed off my muscles well. That's important for a job at the gym, right?" It looked like he would have to improve his lying skills if he wanted to avoid suspicion...

Hannah, luckily, just chuckled a bit at his excuse. "Oooooor you just wanted to show off... as usual," she replied, though he tone indicated she found it more endearing then annoying. His girlfriend then went into their apartment's living room, flopping down onto the couch and turning on the TV.

Breathing a sigh of relief, Jack looked over at the clock. It was a bit past 4 now, giving him a decent amount of time to make it to his interview. Plus, showing up early would be a good thing for him, right? It wasn't like he had much preparing to do...

Heading into the bathroom, Jack grabbed some spray-on deodorant, spreading it all over his pits and chest. The act definitely took longer than he was used to, with all the new space he had to cover. It was a tiny thing, but he loved the way his biceps smooshed up against his pecs as he brought the can across his body. Every movement he made seemed to send a jolt of energy up his superpowered body, and it was AMAZING. After that was done, Jack dug into the cabinets, pulling out a comb to make his hair all nice and proper. While doing this, he noticed another change, though minor and unexpected. Whereas before, his shared bathroom was filled with about 80% Hannah's stuff, 20% his, now it was more of an even 50/50 stuff. He didn't even recognize some of the stuff that was apparently his! Apparently he was more focused on his looks now... not that he would blame himself.

For now, all he did was wet his hair and comb it all to one side. Looking at himself in the mirror, Jack couldn't help but grin. In the attractiveness department, he was still far from perfect, but the stronger look to his face was definitely an improvement in his eyes. At the same time, he was still recognizably... Jack.

He headed out of the bathroom, grabbing his keys and wallet and stuffing them into the tight pocket of his shorts. He paused... then went back over to his desk, grabbing the button and stuffing it into his pockets as well. There was the chance he could have another use for it... and even if he didn't, there was no way he was letting something that powerful out of his sight. Confidence filling him up, he puffed out his large chest and headed out of the apartment.

The gym was only a couple blocks from the residence, so Jack decided just to walk. Immediately, he noticed more changes. He felt himself walking with a bit more swagger to him, as well as a bit faster due to his longer strides. But most importantly, he noticed the stares. Before, he wasn't much to look at, so he was practically invisible when he was out on his own. But now he could feel eyes immediately attracted to his immense frame, and he could see the differing emotions emerge on people's faces - amazement, envy, jealousy, disbelief, lust... all of them just put a big grin on the hulking guy's face.

In no time at all, Jack reached the gym. He pushed open the double glass doors that made up the entrance, finding that he needed to open both of them to squeeze in comfortably. Immediately, he noticed a man waiting in the lobby. He was dressed in a decent suit, but it did little to hide the bulging muscles that were underneath. Though he looked maybe a little soft, like he was out of season, the guy was clearly a bodybuilder or weightlifter of some kind. He was the sort of person Jack would've felt intimidated just being near before - he could hardly believe that he was BIGGER than him now.

"Jack, correct? I'm Will Evans, great to meet you." Up close, Jack could see that the man had a tanned complexion, a near constant smiling face, and gelled up black hair. In a blink of inspiration, he remembered that Will was the owner of the gym.

Will stuck his hand out for a handshake, and Jack smiled, doing the same. As he grasped the other man's hand, instincts suddenly kicked in to tell him not to squeeze too hard. Jack found this odd, considering how he normally shook hands, but once he had actually gripped and started shaking, he could see why he held back. Even when not using full force, he had an iron grip, prominent veins bulging out on his arm. There were so many little intricacies he had to learn...

Will drew his arm back, flexing out his fingers a bit. Just how strong WAS Jack? "Come on, we'll talk in my office." Jack nodded, following Will to the back of the gym.

The owner sat down in his modest office chair behind his desk, letting Jack sit in a chair opposite it. Luckily, such an impressive gym considered that they might get some very large patrons, and the chair had no problem holding Jack's weight. As he sat down, Will laid his arms out on the desk in a relaxed position.

"So, Jack, I figure if you want to help our gym's members find the best way possible to get healthier and stronger, maybe you should tell me about your personal routine first."

For a second, Jack's mind froze. His routine? His workout routine? Thanks to the button, he had gotten this body despite barely having picked up a weight in his life... he didn't know half the words one would even use to describe a workout routine. Was he just going to look like a big idiot in front of this guy.

And then... the words started coming out. Like a waterfall, Jack opened his mouth and started monologuing about a very intense, rigorous routine he went through every day. It was a weird feeling... it was definitely him saying the words, but he felt like he was on autopilot. Still, wasn't like he was complaining - the crisis had been averted, after all. And it was interesting to hear himself talk about what he did to keep his size - did he really jog 5 miles a day?

Will seemed please with it, nodding his head the whole way through. "Very impressive. With a routine like that, I can see why you're so big." Jack couldn't help but chuckle a little, resisting the urge to cockily flex some of his muscles; doing so would probably rip the shirt he was wearing. Still, he was oddly proud of himself.

The interview took about an hour, with the two discussing how to best help customers, what the hours would be like, pay, benefits, all that sort of thing. When it was all over, the two stood up from their chairs, Jack giving the owner a big smile and a firm handshake before he left. He felt incredibly confident that he had the job in the bag.

Standing in the lobby of the gym, Jack couldn't help but sigh happily. He had never felt so good in his life. He was huge, had a nice job lined up, and everything seemed to be going his way...

... And yet, his attention was drawn back to the all-powerful button. As if acting on instinct, he pulled the little device out of his pocket, turning it around in his strong, meaty hand. This was all great... but why not try for better? He didn't know of any limits the button had, so why not have some fun with it and improve his life even more?

Grinning almost uncontrollably, Jack's mind spun through the infinite possibilities, eventually landing on one to wish for. He could always reverse it or do something else if he felt like it, after all. Looking down, Jack let his finger hang over the button in anticipation.

"I wish I was..."
1122.title: ... your interview."

choices: Jack goes home to Hannah.
Something distracts Jack before he can leave the gym.
11221.content:
Jack was standing in the lobby of the gym at which he had just interviewed for a job. As amazing as his life had become with the help of the mysterious button he couldn't help but want a little more, and why not? He could have it. He could have anything he wished for. He strode over to one of the giant mirrors that lined the walls of the lobby and admired his new body. 6 feet 6 inches of super powerful, beefy muscles reflected back at him.

"I wonder how much I weigh?" he mumbled aloud. Suddenly the answer was right there in his mind: 320 pounds. He was going to have to get used to the idea of his current memories merging with those of his new life. It was a strange feeling that he was only just starting to trust like a safety net tied below the tightrope act he was now performing.

He raised an arm and flexed his enormous bicep. His sleeve had already been forced up and off of the mighty peak but even so the quick expansion of his giant muscles were too much for the fabric to stand and a large rip opened up all the way up and onto his shoulder stopping just a few inches shy of the collar.

"Oops!" he said a little louder than he'd intended to. In his reflection he noticed the receptionist at the desk was staring at him. She wore a tight polo shirt that seemed to be the uniform of the gym. Her shoulders were broad and her arms nicely toned with solid muscle. The shirt was tight across her chest where a fairly large pair of breasts were packed inside. She was easily the sort of person that Jack would have fantasized about mere hours ago but now the tables were turned. He could tell from her expression that she was imagining what his muscles must feel like to touch. Locking his eyes on hers he raised his other arm and flexed ripping the other sleeve.

Jack pulled his eyes away from the receptionist for a moment and looked at his magnificent biceps once again. 26 inches, he knew it just by looking at them that his arms measured 26 incredible inches around. Was that a record? Brimming with a confidence he'd never felt before in his life Jack grabbed his shirt with one big hand right on the bat symbol on his chest and pulled. The shirt fell apart like tissue paper leaving his entire bulging upper body exposed.

He looked back over his reflection's shoulder again and saw the beautiful receptionist's mouth was hanging wide open. That was the admiration he wanted, that was the adoration he deserved. He would have it on a global scale. He held the magical button in his hand and spoke loudly, not concerned with being heard.

"I wish I was an incredibly successful pro bodybuilder." Then he pressed the button.

Just like before his body was flooded with energy; however while the last time it had felt like an explosion deep within him this time it was more like electricity crackled through every muscle. He watched his reflection as his body grew again, but this time only slightly. Instead the biggest change was one of details. Moments ago he'd been huge, but bulky and not terribly defined. While his muscle groups were clearly discernible there he also carried a fair amount of fat. Now that fat was melting away while at the same time his sinew seemed to come to life with detail below his skin. Veins previously hidden rose to the surface creating a twisted roadmap across his chest, arms, and legs. At the same time he could feel his muscles getting even harder than before.

As quickly at it began the energy stopped. Jack was panting and his body was covered in sweat. The first transformation had felt incredible but this one, this was beyond description. He looked at his reflection and his face erupted into a grin. His shirt was still gone and his shorts had morphed from denim into black spandex; his skin had also darkened into a bronzed tan symbolic of professional bodybuilders. He noted that he was the same height he'd been a moment ago but had actually gained a little weight now tipping the scales at 350 pounds. That was even more incredible considering the fact that he was insanely shredded. Every muscle stood out in stark detail as if it were ready to pop right off of his body. Each of his 8 abdominals was surrounded by a deep groove and his sides were lined with countless obliques that fed into the larger bricks that lined the front of his stomach. Jack reached down and pulled one leg of his shorts up and gave his leg a hard flex. Huge slabs of muscle surged outward solidifying into giant plates with steel cables running between and around them. He gave his thigh a squeeze and smiled when he felt no give at all, like he was made of solid stone.

He stood back up and marveled once more at his new body, it was a physique unlike any he had ever seen before. Even the various morphs and drawings he'd been collecting from the internet over the years couldn't compare. He looked more like a marble statue of a greek god than a man, and he felt just as powerful.

"Jack," a women's voice spoke from behind him.

He turned and found the receptionist he'd been making eyes at previously standing before him. Her clothes had changed as well, her polo being replaced with a skimpy bikini top. Jack quickly noted that her physique was even more impressive up close as were her breasts which were easily a C cup. "Yes, Danielle?" he replied almost without thinking. Also without thinking he let his eyes run over the rest of her body taking in her long and strong legs which flowed out of a short pleated skirt that was apparently also a new part of her uniform.

The girl blushed. "I was just curious about how things went with Mr. Evans."

Before he could answer Will Evans rounded the corner carrying a gym bag over his shoulder. He was no longer wearing a suit but instead in a tank top and cloth shorts. Just as Jack has suspected the man had a fairly giant physique. In fact, at the moment he looked pretty pumped and his body glistened having just come from the showers.

"Jack!" Evans approached the pair with his hand outstretched. "I just wanted to thank you again. I have to admit I've never done an interview while working out like that, but you're right: you can really learn a lot about someone out on the gym floor. I just hope you feel I'd be right for the job, you've got a hell of a gym here and I'm dying to be a part of it."

Evans turned to Danielle and shook her hand. "It was very nice to meet you my dear," he said then he raised her hand to his lips and gave it a kiss while resting his eyes firmly on her cleavage. After ending the handshake with Danielle he looked back at Jack. "I have to tell you, great choice on the uniforms. I feel like I'm in paradise with angels like this running around." Evans then turned and left.

Jack had to stifle a laugh. He'd come here looking for a job and now he was apparently the owner; and a somewhat pervy one at that forcing his buxom employees to wear bikini tops and skirts.

"Does that answer your question?" Jack said.

"Well, are you going to hire him? Should I get his paperwork started?"

"I don't know," Jack said, "he knows his stuff and gave some good answers. But did you see the way he was staring at your boobs at the end?"

Danielle laughed, "So? What do you care? You stare at my boobs all the time."

"Sure, but I'm your boss. I'm allowed."

Danielle feigned outrage. "That's sexual harassment. I could sue you, you know"

"I'll tell you what, I'll make it up to you." Jack put his hands on his hips and flexed his monstrous pecs, his chest swelling to an incredible 75 inches around. "I'll let you stare at my boobs."

"Well, this job is not without its perks," she purred and reached up to put her hands on his chest.

After letting her feel around for several seconds Jack spoke up, "Alright, I said look. I didn't say you could feel."

"Sue me!" Now she ran her hands down to his abs and moaned with delight.

"Get back to work," Jack said. Danielle pouted and smiled at the same time as she returned to her desk. Jack noticed that right behind where she sat, where previously there had been a display documenting the various success stories to come out of this particular gym, there was now a shrine to himself. Trophies, medals, posters, pictures, magazines, newspapers all showed off Jack and his various success over the years. He spotted headlines proclaiming his first contest wins at age 16, others proclaimed him a mutant or a prodigy, several detailed his undefeated streak and complete dominance on the sport. Jack approached the display and quickly skimmed an excerpt from a magazine that talked about his unheard of strength. Bodybuilders, the article said, while strong are usually outclassed by powerlifters, those who value raw power over aesthetics. Jack, was an anomaly: the perfectly built bodybuilder with strength that no one on the planet could stand up to. The article went on to list the world record lifts that Jack currently held and the list was shockingly long.

"Still your own biggest fan, I see." Danielle sniped. "Haven't you seen enough pictures of yourself yet?" Her comment was intended to bite but he could tell she was smiling when she said it.

Jack didn't even turn around to respond. "And here I thought you were my biggest fan."

"Oh, I can't hold a candle to the love you have for yourself. Plus we both know Hannah comes before me any day."

Hannah! Suddenly Jack wanted to get back home to his girlfriend and feel her hands all over his massive muscles. His wildest fantasies were coming true and he needed to share it with the one woman who truly understood how he felt.

Jack held his hand up and looked at the button that had given him so much. Should he share this gift with Hannah? Of course he would; but perhaps he'd wait until he'd let her pay her respects to the god he'd become.
11221.title: The New Champ

choices: It's Hannah, looking just as she was before.
It's Hannah - but Jack's wish has had some unintentional effects on her body...
112211.content:
Jack couldn't keep the enormous grin off of his face, his imagination swirling with ideas even as he slipped the button into his pocket, feeling his massive thighs pressing up against it and forcing it back against the fabric, along with his phone, keys, and wallet. There were certainly a whole host of potential uses for it... but for now, he wanted to enjoy what he had at the moment. Which was a whole lot by the looks of things.

"Danielle, what's my schedule looking like for the rest of the day?" Jack called back to his receptionist.

"That interview was the last thing you had planned - you said you were going to spend the rest of the day e-mailing contractors about expanding the building, I believe."

"Oh, I can do all that from home. I'm headed out for the day - be a dear and lock up for me, will you?" Still not facing his conversation partner, Jack grunted and 'casually' spread his back muscles out, muscles bulging and rippling as his wall-like figure only became more massive and intimidating - he was pretty sure he could scare off a bear all by himself!

"Oh, yes, of course..." Danielle responded, followed by a huff of desire and excitement that she tried to hide but couldn't hold in enough to avoid letting it reach Jack's ears. Jack almost couldn't believe how easy it was - even being his own boss, just being able to leave work whenever and not be questioned on it was a crazy amount of power in its own right!

"Alright, I'll see you later then." With confident strides, Jack pushed open the glass doors to the gym - HIS gym - and strolled out into the warm open air.

It took Jack about half a block to realize that he had left the gym completely topless... and a whole lot less time for him to realize that he didn't care in the slightest. It wasn't like he was full-on nude, and besides, who was going to stop him? Who would WANT to? Indeed, the attention he got walking down the street, mountainous pectorals casually hefting and slightly bobbing with his heavy thumping footsteps, was just a more amplified version of what he got when he was originally going for the job interview. A whole lot of awe, curiosity, envy, and rather sexual feelings from a whole range of people. And there was the added effect of Jack not only being so huge but also so successful now, in that a couple of people seemed to have looks of recognition across their faces, especially those who were more muscular themselves. But there were even some non-gym rats who appeared to recognize him - was he so famous that he was known outside of just bodybuilding circles?

Jack held his head high and even flashed a couple of smiles at the more openly awed of passerby as he walked the few blocks back to his apartment... only to realize after a few minutes that muscle memory had taken him a different route than he usually went. In fact, this wasn't just some alternate path back to his apartment, he was headed another direction entirely. 15.content:
Finally, Jack closed his eyes, took a deep breath and composed himself, shaking his head as if to shake off the jitters that came with his sudden excitement. He was almost certainly getting ahead of himself. The feeling when he touched the button was something he couldn't quite describe, but c'mon - what it was supposed to be was something that was, like, godly levels of power. Why would something like that be given away in a pop-up ad of all things - and how? He couldn't help but smirk as he rolled his eyes - he was letting his imagination run away like always.

Still... what was the harm in having a little fun? His gaze fell down to the button in his hand again, squeezing his palm around it a little tighter. It was surprisingly sturdy, and felt pretty durable. Not what he expected from a free thing like this. Jack sighed, turning it over in his hand a bit more. It was silly, sure, but what was the harm in indulging a little bit? Worst case scenario, he would just feel like a bit of a dummy and move on. But if it did somehow work...

Jack turned in a circle in his room, looking for something he could test this power out on. He didn't want to try anything too major yet, that seemed like he would be getting ahead of himself; something minor but unmistakable would work best for a test run. Finally, Jack's vision landed on a plain, plastic bottle of water sitting next to his computer, half-empty and probably rather warm at this point, having been sitting by his side the whole day.

"I wish that bottle of water was... an unopened can of Red Bull."

Jack clicked the button.

There was an instant flash that filled Jack's vision with pure white, causing him to cry out in surprise and stumble back a step, holding his hands up to shield his eyes. The flash didn't seem to have a source, though, and was over as soon as it began. The spots quickly faded from Jack's eyes, and after a quick rub to clear his vision Jack lowered his hands...

Only to find that sitting on his desk was an unopened, glossy can of Red Bull energy drink, the bottle of water nowhere in sight.

Jack's jaw dropped, but he couldn't find the words, not even a little gasp of surprise. Not even able to begin comprehending this, he took a few steps up to the desk, picking up the can and examining it. It was a Red Bull can alright, not only feeling filled to the brim but cold to the touch as well, like it had just been pulled out of the fridge. Jack quickly glanced around, but of course, he didn't see anyone. He even raced over to the front door to check it, but sure enough, it was locked as always. No one would have been able to get in and out quickly enough to make the swap, much less the many other things that made it impossible...

Taking a deep breath, Jack cracked the can open, the sound echoing throughout the lonely apartment. He brought it up to his lips and took a sip - yup, that was Red Bull alright.

Jack let out another exhale, heading back over to his computer and setting the can down, going back to his frantic pacing back and forth.

"No way... no way... no WAY..."

Jack muttered to himself... but by the end of it, he found himself smiling. He didn't know how it was possible, but by a miracle, it had worked. This thing really DID work like it said it would! At least, it seemed like it did...

The flood gates of his imagination opened once more, Jack spun around, trying to fix his gaze on something else he could exert this power over. Starting off simple was good, but now that he found out this button was actually all it claimed to be, he wanted to push it further, see what the extent of its abilities really was. In a few moments, he landed on his laundry basket, currently filled to the brim with all sorts of clothing, most of it his but some of it Hannah's too.

"I wish all of the laundry was done!"

Jack pushed the button again, but this time he was prepared, shutting his eyes right as the flash overtook everything. Thanks to this, he didn't feel the sting of blindness - in fact, there was no pain or discomfort at all. He opened his eyes as fast as he could, seeing if he could catch some magic in action; but to his amazement, in less than a second, the pile had completely disappeared.

Jack practically sprinted the few feet over to the laundry basket, confirming that there wasn't even a sock left behind. Then he ran over to his dresser, hands shaking as he pulled open one of the drawers, finding all of his shirts neatly folded up, even neater than he normally would! And he quickly confirmed that most of these were definitely ones he had wore recently.

At this point, Jack couldn't help but let out a laugh, stumbling backwards and putting his hands on his head in shock - only to be reminded of the little button still in his palm. He was practically jumping up and down at this point - nothing seemed out of his reach! All that was on his mind was going bigger, more extravagant...

153.content:
As his heart continued to race over the immeasurable potential the button in his hand had, he looked to what had got him the button in the first place, his computer. Looking at it, he began to look at it and reminisce over all he's done with it...all as he realizes how long he's had it for. The computer has been used for a few years at least, even before he met Hannah, and from a quick glance, it showed. The keys seemed overused at this point, some letters being faded while other keys were a bit stiff to press, and would need more than a simple tap to make them work. Not only that, but using the computer for too long would cause the internal fan to roar loudly, and it was quite the mood killer whenever he was exploring forums with his girlfriend, or even on his own. But despite that, he still had some sentimental attachment to it, since if it wasn't for that computer, he would have never met Hannah, after all. He looked to the button, and back to the computer, and decided he needed to make some changes.

"I wish my computer worked as well as it did when I bought it!"

And with another click of the button, followed by the blinding flash of light, he looks to his computer and stares in awe.

"Holy shit!"

He puts the button down and looks over his computer in joy. His keys all looked brand new, with no issues occurring whenever he tapped them. All the letters and numbers worked, and as he explores all the fixes, he also notices some files on his desktop. He opens them up, and lo and behold, all of the files he opened up were the exact files on the computer prior to the button press, from his assignments for class to some of the buff women images he downloaded for 'safe keeping'. He was ecstatic over how well the computer was touched up, and begins to grin to himself.

"Wow, works like a charm! And not a single loss of data on it! Now, what to do next..."

He looks around the room, and looks to the bed he and Hannah shared. It was a nice bed, sure, but sometimes it could seem a bit too small, or a tad too stiff. He didn't even need to think before he picked up the button, and made another request.

"I wish me and Hannah had a queen...no, King Sized Bed instead of this one!"

The button is pushed once more, and with another flash, he takes a look at the bed, and happily jumps into it. The bed is much larger, and the mattress he lays on feels perfect, with just enough softness to rest in, but just enough firmness to hold someone's weight. He sighs in bliss as he rests on the bed for a little while, before slowly getting up, looking around the apartment, and realizing how out of place the new bed seems. He chuckles to himself as he simply grabs the button, and makes another wish.

"I wish my apartment matched the quality of this bed!"

Another click, another flash, and Jack smiles to himself at how the apartment has changed. The walls were repainted brighter shades of colour, making a more vibrate environment, while the room itself seems to have grown in size. The floor is cleaned up, and as Jack explores the apartment, he discovers more than just changes to the apartment. Checking the bathroom, not only is the toilet clean and upgraded, with the shower being expanded to a bathtub of sorts, but even the toiletries are all changed, seemingly for the better with higher quality products everywhere, from softer, thicker toilet paper to better soap. Exploring more, the clothing he and Hannah owned within the expanded closet are all changed as well, some looking newer than usual, others changing logo and brand to better suit their tastes, with Jack's She-Hulk shirt showing a more dominant and buff She-Hulk posing on the front, causing him to redden a bit upon seeing it. More exploring reveals similar results; the fridge is restocked with some enjoyable sweets and meals, the laundry machines are top of the line, so on and so forth. His apartment has gone from average at worst, to high class and over-the-top. It looked beyond his budget, but with this button in his hand, he couldn't care less. All he could do now was sit back in his chair, relax, and think of what to do next.
153.title: Jack improves their apartment.

info.brief_description: When a reality-changing button lands on the door step of two muscle growth fanatics...
info.description:
Jack and Hannah are two budding 18 year old lovers attending college together and living in the same apartment. Together they share a common trait - both are muscle growth fanatics, with the bigger the better being their philosophy. While neither of them are at all fit, they still spend their time going through the Internet looking at art, morphs, and stories about insanely muscular guys and girls. But all that stuff's just a fantasy, right? No one could REALLY get that big.

See, you'd THINK that...

The couples' views on everything completely changes when a button arrives at their door that claims it can literally change any aspect of reality they wish, just with a thought! Jack and Hannah must then decide how best to use the button, hoping to achieve their wildest dreams...

Alright, here's some facts about our leads:

Jack
Age: 18
Height: 5' 11"
Weight: 150 lbs.
Build: Skinny
Hair Color: Brown
Hair Length: Short
Eye Color: Brown
Accessories: Glasses
Hobbies: Muscle art, muscle fiction, general nerdy activities (comics, movies, TV, conventions, etc.)
School: Northern State University (NSU)
Romantic Partner: Hannah

Hannah
Age: 18
Height: 5' 6"
Weight: 125
Build: Slender
Hair Color: Black
Hair Length: Long
Eye Color: Green
Accessories: None
Hobbies: See Jack
School: Northern State University (NSU)
Romantic Partner: Jack

If there's any other info you think should be on here, just contact me and I'll try to get it up. Now, onto the rules:

- This is a muscle growth-based story, meaning fetishes of other kinds (macro, micro, weight gain, etc.) are most likely not allowed. Fetishes that usually go along with muscle growth (breast growth, penis growth, etc.) are allowed as long as they coincide with the muscle growth.

- That being said, due to the nature of the button, other changes may be made to the universe as long as muscle growth is still the main focus of the story. This means you can make them richer, make everyone accept their new growth, whatever you can think of. Creativity is very much welcome.

- Other characters may be grown, but Jack and Hannah must remain part of the story, as they are the main characters.

- Each chapter added MUST be of noticeable length, as determined by me, the story's original creator. I reserve the right to remove any chapter that I feel is not of considerable content. Don't let this rule make you sweat too much, though - I'm pretty lenient and have never had to make use of this rule. Just write at least a good paragraph or two and you're good - though remember that longer is better ;)

Well, that's all the rules I have for now, but I may update this section should I think of anymore, so try and check back just to make sure you aren't accidentally breaking anything new. Besides that, though, have fun writing!
